title: Ranked, why bother?
body:
So, after playing for years I thought I would try ranked for the first time......

Fuck me what a mistake that was, full of toxic little kids....thanks Riot, I thought Overwatch was bad.

replies.body: you can get people like that in standard game also, just ignore it and play. if you don't you will wont ever play the game again or any game at all because honestly in pretty much most online games there are people like that
only Trash game have people like this,  this community is so bad i hope they get erased, PUBG is more fun even with random people it is fun and no toxic or harm or KYS comment on voice chat
So firstly you have to lock your champ in second as far as I can tell you don’t even play norms u play only aram so why would u ever play a ranked game when u don’t even play norms

> [{quoted}](name=LAKIGR,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=EZL3WWFH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-10-06T11:46:50.257+0000)
>
> So firstly you have to lock your champ in second as far as I can tell you don’t even play norms u play only aram so why would u ever play a ranked game when u don’t even play norms

dont know what you on about? iv played more then 2000 normal games so how can u not tell me that i only play aram?
Well when I look at your account I can’t see them all I can find is aram
just glitched sometimes stuff dont seem to work properly, dont get me wrong i do play aram but i do play normal also
